Service Worker Controls

Service Worker Status

Enable offline functionality and progressive web app features

Checking...

Advanced controls for managing the service worker and cached data. Use with caution as these actions cannot be undone.

What these do:
  • Enable SW: Activates offline functionality and caching
  • Disable SW: Temporarily stops service worker features
  • Clear Caches: Removes all cached files, forces fresh downloads
  • Unregister SW: Completely removes service worker, page will reload
